did.unittitle: Carolyn Riggs Bernardin Collection of Riggs & Lombard Photographs, 1942
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Photographs of the interior of the Riggs & Lombard machinery factory.

bioghist.p: Riggs & Lombard, Inc. was a Lowell, Massachusetts, company that manufactured, bought and sold textile and other machinery.

scopecontent.p: Includes photographs of the stock room, wood and steel erection floors, assembly floors, and machine shops. All photographs were taken by Marion Photographers, Lowell, Massachusetts, on January 13, 1942.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

scopecontent.p: Visible are all sorts of wheels, couplings, hoses, etc. Photo taken January 13, 1942. 25.25 x 20.25 cm.
Wheels, lumber, ladders, etc. around the room; several male employees visible including two on the left who appear to be building a large wooden crate. Photo taken January 13, 1942. 25.25 x 20.25 cm.
Several male employees visible; steel machinery was apparently built on this floor. Photo taken January 13, 1942. 25.25 x 20.25 cm.

Image depicts the area where dryers were assembled. Different lengths of metal stacked on floor; workbenches in rear where several male employees work. Note the bucket of sand on the pole labeled "Air Raid." Photo taken January 13, 1942. 25.25 x 20.25 cm.
Several male employees at work in the area. Photo taken January 13, 1942. 25.25 x 20.25 cm.

A number of male employees are at work in the shop. Floor in the foreground is piled with wood shavings. This machine shop seems to be geared toward larger pieces, as opposed to machine shop B (see item 9 in this folde). Photo taken January 13, 1942. 25.25 x 20.25 cm.
Several male employees are at work cutting or planing lumber. Photo taken January 13, 1942. 25.25 x 20.25 cm.

One male employee in the foreground is hoisting sheets of steel; several others are at work in the background, including one who has tipped his welding mask up onto his head. Photo taken January 13, 1942. 25.25 x 20.25 cm.
Several male employees at work. This machine shop seems to focus on smaller items, as opposed to machine shop A (see item 6 in this folder). Photo taken January 13, 1942. 25.25 x 20.25 cm.
